sentences: Peter Pontiac (born Peter J.G. Pollmann; 28 April 1951 â€“ 20 January 2015) was a Dutch cartoonist, comics artist and illustrator.
He was the winner of the 1997 Stripschapprijs.
Pontiac died on 20 January 2015, after a lengthy battle with severe liver disease.
2011 - Marten Toonderprijs for his entire oeuvre
